# Detailed information on the calculation of the ACE indicators

## Cost-effectiveness indicators

Main indicators used in ACE report to analyse ANSPs cost-effectiveness are economic cost-effectiveness indicator, financial cost-effectiveness indicator, ATCO-hour productivity, ATCO employment costs per ATCO-hour and support cost per composite flight-hours. In the table below are presented formulas and sources of data used for calculation.

+------------+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \#         | Indicator                               | Formula                                                                                | Source                                                                                      |
+============+=========================================+========================================================================================+=============================================================================================+
| 1          | Composite flight-hours                  | En-route flight-hours +(0.27×IFR airport movements)                                    | ***En-route flight-hours:*** Item D16, continental ANS                                      |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        |                                                                                             |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        | ***IFR airport movements:*** Item D18, SES airports + Non-SES airports                      |
+------------+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 2          | Economic cost-effectiveness             | (Total service provision costs+Total costs of ATFM delays)/(Composite flight-hours)    | ***Total service provision costs:*** Item A15, en-route + terminal                          |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        |                                                                                             |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        | ***Total costs of ATFM delays:*** Network manager database (see chapter 4 for more details) |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        |                                                                                             |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        | ***Composite flight hours:*** Formula #1                                                    |
+------------+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 3          | Financial cost-effectiveness            | (Total service provision costs)/(Composite flight-hours)                               | ***Total service provision costs:*** Item A15, en-route + terminal                          |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        |                                                                                             |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        | ***Composite flight hours:*** Formula #1                                                    |
+------------+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 4          | ATCO-hour productivity                  | (Composite flight-hour)/(Sum of ATCO in OPS hours on duty)                             | ***Composite flight hours:*** Formula #1                                                    |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        |                                                                                             |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        | ***Sum of ATCO in OPS hours on duty:*** Item D22, ACCs + APPs+TWRs                          |
+------------+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 5          | ATCO employment costs per ATCO-hour     | (ATCOs in OPS Employment costs)/(Sum of ATCO in OPS hours on duty)                     | ***ATCOs in OPS Employment costs:*** Item C23, en-route + terminal                          |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        |                                                                                             |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        | ***Sum of ATCO in OPS hours on duty:*** Item D22, ACCs + APPs+TWRs                          |
+------------+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 6          | Support costs per composite flight-hour | (Total service provision costs-ATCOs in OPS Employment costs)/(Composite flight-hours) | ***Total service provision costs:*** Item A15, en-route + terminal                          |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        |                                                                                             |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        | ***ATCOs in OPS Employment costs:*** Item C23, en-route + terminal                          |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        |                                                                                             |
|            |                                         |                                                                                        | ***Composite flight hours:*** Formula #1                                                    |
+------------+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

## Financial situation indicators

Current ratio and cash-on-hand days indicators are used in ACE report to analyse ANSPs financial situation. Formulas and sources of data used for calculation are presented in table below.

+-----------+-------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| \#        | Indicator         | Formula                                                                    | Source                                               |
+===========+===================+============================================================================+======================================================+
| 1         | Current ratio     | (Current assets)/(Current liabilities)                                     | ***Current assets:*** Item B15, Total ANS            |
|           |                   |                                                                            |                                                      |
|           |                   |                                                                            | ***Current liabilities:*** Item B30, Total ANS       |
+-----------+-------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 2         | Cash-on-hand days | (Cash in hand or at bank)/(Employment costs+Non-staff operating costs)×365 | ***Cash in hand or at bank***: Item B18, Total ANS   |
|           |                   |                                                                            |                                                      |
|           |                   |                                                                            | ***Employment costs:*** Item A16, Total ANS          |
|           |                   |                                                                            |                                                      |
|           |                   |                                                                            | ***Non-staff operating costs:*** Item A17, Total ANS |
+-----------+-------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
